channel.title: Stormy on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Stormy on ZooBerry

item.title: Paw Prints Theme Pack
item.description: Paw Prints theme pack for your zoo. Includes a bench and trashcan both covered in little paw prints.

item.title: Zebra Theme Pack
item.description: A zebra theme pack for your zoo. Includes a picnic table, trashcan, and viewing canopy.

item.title: Dingo II
item.description: An Australian scrub animal with slight color variations.

item.title: Domestic Cat
item.description: Domestic cats with five color variations.

item.title: Northern River Otter
item.description: A cute North American otter for your zoo.

item.title: Party Tiger
item.description: A festive tiger with three color variations to celebrate ATW4.

item.title: Party Zebra
item.description: A festive addition to celebrate ATW4.

item.title: Quagga
item.description: A beautiful extinct subspecies of Plains Zebra.

item.title: Red Fox III
item.description: A playful red fox with three variations.

item.title: Sand Goanna
item.description: A resident of the Australian scrub.

item.title: Spirit Bear
item.description: A unique white Black Bear from British Columbia.

item.title: American Badger II
item.description: A North American carnivore for grasslands.

item.title: Arctic Wolf
item.description: An Arctic tundra wolf with color variations.

item.title: Bat-Eared Fox II
item.description: A savannah carnivore.

item.title: Black Bear II
item.description: A North American ursid with coat variations.

item.title: King Kong II
item.description: A fictional animal for tropical rainforest exhibits.

item.title: Cotton Candy Bench
item.description: A very pink bench designed to look like cotton candy.

item.title: Inlaid Stone Picnic Table
item.description: A classic-looking picnic table for your guests.

item.title: Jungle Bench
item.description: Jungle-themed benches to let your guests rest.

item.title: Tiger Bench
item.description: A wild tiger-patterned bench to spice up your zoo.

item.title: Unleashed Bench
item.description: A bench made to celebrate ZTUF.

item.title: Borneo Clouded Leopard
item.description: Two variations of the Borneo Clouded Leopard, with the lighter one being the default.

item.title: Dall's Porpoise
item.description: A detailed and fun-to-watch Dall’s Porpoise for your zoo.

item.title: Great Plains Wolf
item.description: The Great Plains Wolf with three color variations, as requested by Soop.

item.title: Whitetip Reef Shark
item.description: Two variations of the Whitetip Reef Shark, with different markings.

item.title: Yellow-Footed Rock Wallaby II
item.description: A cute little Yellow-Footed Rock Wallaby from Australia.

item.title: Eurasian Wolf
item.description: The Eurasian Wolf features two variants, with the lighter one as the default.

item.title: Lemon Shark
item.description: The Lemon Shark features two variations, with the darker variation as the default skin. Requires MM2 to use.

item.title: Spotted Hyena II
item.description: The Spotted Hyena requires the Endangered Species and African Adventure expansions to use.
